member.summary: Class for interfacing to a Python Module from Simpl Sharp.

member.summary: Prorgam Friendly Name or RoomId.

member.summary: Returns True if python modules are supported.

member.returns: 'true' - indicating showextra is enabled for this process; 'false' otherwise.

member.summary: Initialize the static instance of the class.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.Python.SimplSharpPythonInterface.PythonManagerCallback(System.String)
member.summary: Callback to recieve data from python manager via JsonDb
member.param: JSON Message received

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.Python.SimplSharpPythonInterface.Shutdown
member.summary: Shutdown the static instance of the class.

members.member:
Method to start a specified instance of the module.The module should have the "crestron_main" point defined. The specifies a unique Id for this instance. We cannot have two instances with the same running.
Unique Identifier for this instance. A maximum length of 128 characters is supported. An array of strings to pass as parameters to the instance Path to the module to load. Callback which is invoked whenever any data is received from that specific instance. Returns a for the specific instance. The specified argument is null The specified modulePath is not valid. The Python support on this device is not running as expected.\ Python support is not avaiable. The uniqueIdentifier specified is already in use by a running module. The uniquerIdentifier is an empty string. The length of the uniqueIdentifier argument is above the maximum supported length of 128 characters. The python module being invoked should have the "crestron_main" entry point defined. If not defined the module is not run. The status of the module instance return will indicate this.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.Python.SimplSharpPythonInterface.SendData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method to send data to the specified instance. The instance is specified using the . This call will not store the data.
member.param: Unique Identifier of the instance to send to. The instance need not be running for us to send data to that particular instance.
String to send to the specified instance
member.returns: True if we are able to send data to the specified instance

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.Python.SimplSharpPythonInterface.SendData(System.String,System.String,Crestron.SimplSharp.JsonDb.eSaveType)
member.summary: Method to send data to the specified instance. The instance is specified using the
member.param: Unique Identifier of the instance to send to. The instance need not be running for us to send data to that particular instance.
String to send to the specified instance
Indicates whether the data should be saved across program restarts/reboots or should only persist in memory.
member.returns: True if we are able to send data to the specified instance

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.Python.SimplSharpPythonInterface.SendData(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method to send data to the specified instance under a different program. The instance is specified using the and the program is specified using the . This call will not store the data.
member.param: Friendly name of the program to send data to.
Unique Identifier of the instance to send to. The instance need not be running for us to send data to that particular instance.
String to send to the specified instance
member.returns: True if we are able to send data to the specified instance

member.summary: Method to send data to the specified instance under a different program. The instance is specified using the and the program is specified using the
member.param: Friendly name of the program to send data to.
Unique Identifier of the instance to send to. The instance need not be running for us to send data to that particular instance.
String to send to the specified instance
Indicates whether the data should be saved across program restarts/reboots or should only persist in memory.
member.returns: True if we are able to send data to the specified instance

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.Python.SimplSharpPythonInterface.ClearData(System.String)
member.summary: Method to clear out all the data for the specified instance. The instance is specified using the
member.param: Unique Identifier of the instance to clear data from. The instance need not be running for us to send data to that particular instance.
member.returns: True if we are able to clear out the data

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.Python.SimplSharpPythonInterface.GetData(System.String)
member.summary: Method to read all the stored data for the specified instance. The instance is specified using the
member.param: Unique Identifier of the instance to read data from. The instance need not be running for us to send data to that particular instance.
member.returns: string containing the json data for the specified instance.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.Python.SimplSharpPythonInterface.GetData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method to read all the stored data for the specified instance under a different program. The instance is specified using the and the program is specified using the
member.param: Friendly name of the program to query data from.
Unique Identifier of the instance to read data from. The instance need not be running for us to send data to that particular instance.
member.returns: String containing the json data for the specified instance.
